attachments.title: Tell Portland officials what you think about taxis, Uber and Lyft - Portland Business Journal
attachments.text: The task force created to overhaul Portland's for-hire transportation rules is holding a public hearing this week to gather input on what the new laws should look like.
attachments.fallback: Portland Business Journal: Tell Portland officials what you think about taxis, Uber and Lyft - Portland Business Journal

text: If anyone is interested in Uber & Portland and hearing opinions, the city is hosting a town hall session tomorrow.
